title: JavaScript Drum Kit
detailsText: In this project we used addEventListener, something that I don't remember ever using in vanilla. Oh yeah and I have never used the <kbd> element/tag and the data-key binding to in HTML. Cool stuff.

title: JS and CSS Clock
detailsText: In the clock project I found myself making little customizations to make it look better, took off transition animations, and I am not certain about how I am calc hours yet.

title: CSS Variables
detailsText: Learned how to make CSS variables without SASS or LESS, and messed around with some other CSS properties for a more responsive experience.

title: Array Cardio Day 1
detailsText: This was supposed to be a console.log assignment, but I decided to just render out everything instead using vue.js.

title: Flex Panel Gallery
detailsText: Don't know what I am going to do with this one.
